Name: Pick, shoot, repeat!
About the game: It is a gun-building game, where the goal is to survival as long as you can to unlocks new maps. The mechanic is: - PICK your upgrades. - SHOOT to survive. - REPEAT the process. 35 upgrades 12 levels Endless combinations, but which one would help you survive the longest?
